text: These are small units that protect the general whilst he gets on with his job.
These units can throw powerful grenades to cause great damage to the enemy, but are weak if engaged in melee due to their low numbers.
Mid-range units with exceptional high rate of fire.
Frontline soldiers trained for hand-to-hand combat with their enemies.
The hammer to the infantry of any army, they are devastating when charged into the flank or rear of enemies.
Frontline soldiers trained for hand-to-hand combat.
Long-range units who provide support for melee units, but are themselves very weak in close combat.
These units can throw powerfull grenades to cause great damage to the enemy, but are weak if engaged in combat due to their low numbers.
Stones thrown from awaf will cause chaos in their ranks and slow their movement.
With a long range and able to cause great damage, field artillery units can be moved slowly around the battlefield, but are very weak if engaged in melee.
Frontline soldiers trained for hand-to-hand combat.
Long-range units who provide support for melee units, but are themselves very weak in close combat.
Solid defensive infantry protected by shields, they are very good when ranged against cavalry.
Huge siege engines perfect for knocking down walls and gatehouses.
Although versatile units protected by shields, melee cavalry are weak against more specialised units.

Fast moving and long range, missile cavalry are great at harassing their enemies, but weak if pinned down in melee.
Capable of settling other ships alight.
Long pikes make these troops deadly from the front but vulnerable if flanked. They are highly effective against cavalry.

There's nothing quite like elephants to make a hole in an enemy line. Flaming projectiles and javelins are the best way to counter them.
Slow but with plenty of space, they do their job well. Just remember that they aren't warships.
Fast moving and short-range, missile cavalry are great at harassing their enemies, but weak if pinned down in melee.

Nothing says "surprise!" like unleashing animals on the battlefield.
Short-range units that can take exceptionally high damage.

War dogs are great to attack lightly armoured units.
Perfect for taking out enemy ships, but have to close quickly and board to be successful.

Fast moving units with a wide turning circle, they can punch through weak enemy units. They are vulnerable if pinned down in combat.

Enemy ships can be showered with their projectiles, but they must steer clear of enemy melee ships.
